data.description: A string specifying the BEDPE file path, a dataframein BEDPE format specifying data to be plotted, or a\link[InteractionSet]{GInteractions} object

chrom.description: A string representing the chromosome of region to be plotted

chromstart.description: An integer start position on chromosome to be plotted

chromend.description: An integer end position on chromosome to be plotted

assembly.description: A string specifying the default genome assembly or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

fill.description: A character value, a vector, ora \link[plotgardener]{colorby} object specifying fill colors ofpaired range elements

linecolor.description: A  character value, a vector, or a\link[plotgardener]{colorby} object specifying the color of the linesoutlining paired range elements

bg.description: A character value indicating background color

boxHeight.description: A numeric or unit object specifying height of boxesat either end of paired range elements

spaceWidth.description: A numeric specifying the width of spacing betweenpaired range elements, as a fraction of the plot's genomic range

spaceHeight.description: A numeric specifying the height of space betweenboxes of paired range elements on different rows

limitLabel.description: A logical value indicating whether to draw a "+"when not all elements can be plotted in the plotting space

baseline.description: A logical value indicating whether to include a baselinealong the x-axis

baseline.color.description: A string specifying the baseline color

baseline.lwd.description: A numeric specifying the baseline line width

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying paired range plot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying paired range plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying paired range plot width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying paired range plot height

just.description: A string specifying the hustification of paired range plot relativeto its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only givenas numerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphicsoutput should be produced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
